alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 6:41PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, west central Morgan, Walton and central Newton Counties through 715 PM EST... At 641 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Oxford, or near Covington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Loganville, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Rutledge, Between, Jersey, Georgia International Horse Park, Ebenezer, Almon, Milstead, Youth, Starrsville, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Big Haynes Creek Park and Brick Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for north central Georgia.
